OAKWOOD.NAME: Oakwood
OAKWOOD.DESCRIPTION: Oakwood nestles beneath majestic oak trees, its cottages blending into the peaceful embrace of the forest. It's an old village, but it's full of charm.

PINEHILL.NAME: Pinehill
PINEHILL.DESCRIPTION: The gentle village of Pinehill overlooks the rolling woods, where the scent of pine wafts along every narrow path.

CEDARBROOK.NAME: Cedarbrook
CEDARBROOK.DESCRIPTION: Cedarbrook nestles by a gentle stream, its wooden bridges creaking softly beneath passing travelers.

MAPLECROSS.NAME: Maplecross
MAPLECROSS.DESCRIPTION: Maplecross lies where two paths meet, its red-leaved trees welcoming wanderers with quiet warmth.

BIRCKFIELD.NAME: Birchfield
BIRCKFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Birchfield stretches across golden meadows, its pale trees shimmering in the morning light.

DARKROAD.NAME: Darkroad
DARKROAD.DESCRIPTION: Darkroad sits at the edge of shadowed woods, where travelers find refuge from the encroaching night

WOODENPALE.NAME: Woodenpale
WOODENPALE.DESCRIPTION: Woodenpale is a quiet village of timber homes, its streets lined with lanterns that glow softly at dusk
